title: TiKV OOM itself
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?

6.6.0-alpha
4619f32f07207343692dc641656822c65157c616

### What operating system and CPU are you using?

Linux, with 16GB RAM.

### Steps to reproduce

Run TiKV with write workload.

### What did you expect?

TiKV keep running.

### What did happened?

TiKV OOM after some time.
